Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx

package io.github.zero88.schedulerx
The scheduler.x core API
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.github.zero88.schedulerx.impl
    The scheduler.x internal implementation.
    io.github.zero88.schedulerx.mutiny
     
    io.github.zero88.schedulerx.rxjava3
     
    io.github.zero88.schedulerx.spi
    The scheduler.x SPI
    io.github.zero88.schedulerx.trigger
    Provides the classes and interfaces to define the trigger and its scheduler.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    ExecutionContext<OUT>
    Represents for a runtime context per each execution round.
    ExecutionResult<OUTPUT>
    Represents for task result will be pass on each event of SchedulingMonitor
    JobData<T>
    Represents for a provider that supplies input data before the execution is started, and that will be sent to the task in runtime execution.
    Scheduler<IN,OUT,TRIGGER extends Trigger>
    A scheduler schedules a task to run based on a particular trigger.
    SchedulerBuilder<IN,OUT,TRIGGER extends Trigger,SCHEDULER extends Scheduler<IN,OUT,TRIGGER>,SELF extends SchedulerBuilder<IN,OUT,TRIGGER,SCHEDULER,SELF>>
    Represents for the high level of a builder that construct Scheduler
    SchedulerState<OUT>
    Represents for a management state of the execution lifecycle.
    SchedulingLogMonitor<OUT>
    Represents for a log monitor that observes and do log on each lifecycle event of the task executor.
    SchedulingMonitor<OUT>
    Represents for a monitor that watches lifecycle event in the task executor.
    Task<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Represents for Task to run on each trigger time.
    TaskExecutor<IN,OUT>
    Represents for an executor run a task in conditional loop.
    TaskExecutorProperties<IN,OUT>
    Shared immutable fields between TaskExecutor and its builder.
